source: Parohul bisericii “Sfinții Martiri Brâncoveni”, de la Mitropolia Basarabiei, este cel care a reanimat comunitatea românească de enoriași din Soroca.
target: The parish priest of the "Holy Brâncoveanu Martyrs" church, from the Metropolis of Bessarabia, is the one who revived the Romanian community of parishioners in Soroca.
